article.title: Lockheed Martin to Support MH-60 Helicopters
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Owego, New York, is being awarded a $61,425,658 basic ordering agreement to repair/overhaul 182 various weapons replacement assemblies and shop replaceable assemblies used in support of the common cockpit for MH-60R/S helicopters; the electronic support measurement receiver processor on the MH-60R helicopter; and the organic airborne mine counter measure on the MH-60S.Â The NAVSUP Weapon Systems Support, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
